## Description

Implement the foundational navigation structure for the new Admin Dashboard, following the [UI/UX Analysis](docs/agent-docs/ANALYSIS_UI_UX.md).

## Tasks

- [ ] Install `@tabler/icons-svelte`.
- [ ] Refactor `Sidebar.svelte` to use a data-driven menu structure with icons.
- [ ] Implement "Active State" highlighting for the current route.
- [ ] Add a branding area/logo to the Sidebar.
- [ ] Implement a User Profile menu at the bottom of the Sidebar.
- [ ] Ensure the Sidebar is responsive (collapsible drawer on mobile).
- [ ] Update `Header.svelte` to include Breadcrumbs.

## Reference

- See `docs/agent-docs/ANALYSIS_UI_UX.md` for design details.
